QueryDefination.QueryString: select JL.InventTransRefId, JH.JournalId, JL.ItemId, JL.InventDimId , JL.CreatedBy, JL.ReturnDispositionCodeId DispositionCodeId from WMSJournalTable JH inner join WMSJournalTrans JL on JH.DataAreaId = JL.DataAreaId and JH.JournalId = JL.JournalId where JL.DataAreaId = 'las' and JL.InventTransRefId = @ReturnSalesId -- {ReturnSalesId}
